content.question: The impetus for the labor reforms described by the author are best understood in which of the following political contexts?

choices.label: The increasing influence of public opinion and mass political parties
The increasing national rivalries for overseas territories
The continuation of monarchical forms of government in most of Europe
The increasing calls for womenâ€™s political and economic equality

content.answer: The increasing influence of public opinion and mass political parties

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
